name: OuterRealm
description:
Play as a Elite soldier in ironclad atomic power armor, collect powerful weapons, crush endless waves of voidborn horrors and step into the realm portal, to finish their demigod masters.

An old school FPS,collect items,unlock powerful upgrades,kill boss,find exits,and endless mode.

Powerful not fancy,your weapons are like cast iron ingots with LEDs and your health bar is huge,charge recklessly,use flak cannon as a hammer to smash bones in close combat,deal brutal elemental damages,shoot blasting bullets out of your oversized overheated guns, use giant sword to cut chunks of aliens,with a little bit of combat skill,monsters fear you.
